title: Long Walk on the Beach
caption: Today mom took me to the beach! It was sooososososos fun! Found a really big stick and accidentally broke the stick and got back on my feet went for swin and had a great day!

title: Great nap spot
caption: Today was feeling alitle sleepy so I did a nap in the house and saw a sun beam on the couch curled up into a blanket and had the greatest nap of my life
